function.name: if97_tsatp
function.description: Calculates saturated temperature [K] as a function of pressure, p [Pa].

function.name: if97_psatt
function.description: Calculates saturated pressure [Pa] as a function of temperature, T [K].

function.name: if97_tcrit
function.description: Returns the saturated temperature [K] at the critial point. A dummy parameter must be provided (e.g. 0).

function.name: if97_ttrip
function.description: Returns the saturated temperature [K] at the triple point. A dummy parameter must be provided (e.g. 0).

function.name: if97_pcrit
function.description: Calculates saturated pressure [Pa] at the critial point. A dummy parameter must be provided (e.g. 0).

function.name: if97_ptrip
function.description: Calculates saturated pressure [Pa] at the triple point. A dummy parameter must be provided (e.g. 0).

function.name: if97_t23
function.description: Calculates Temperature [K] along the Region 2/3 boundary as a function of pressure, p [Pa].

function.name: if97_p23
function.description: Calculates Pressure [Pa] along the Region 2/3 boundary as a function of temperature, T [K].

function.name: if97_vtp
function.description: Calculates the specific volume [m³/kg] as a function of T [K] and p [Pa].

function.name: if97_rhotp
function.description: Calculates the mass density [kg/m^3] as a function of T [K] and p [Pa].

function.name: if97_htp
function.description: Calculates the mass enthalpy [J/kg] as a function of T [K] and p [Pa].

function.name: if97_utp
function.description: Calculates the mass internal energy [J/kg] as a function of T [K] and p [Pa].

function.name: if97_stp
function.description: Calculates the mass entropy [J/kg-K] as a function of T [K] and p [Pa].

function.name: if97_cptp
function.description: Calculates the isobaric specific heat [J/kg/K] as a function of T [K] and p [Pa].

function.name: if97_cvtp
function.description: Calculates the isochoric specific heat [J/kg/K] as a function of T [K] and p [Pa].

function.name: if97_wtp
function.description: Calculates the speed of sound [m/s] as a function of T [K] and p [Pa].
